scenario.sendRequestSIP: SUBSCRIBE sip:[InviteeName]@[Domain] SIP/2.0 To: "[InviteeName]" <sip:[InviteeName]@[Domain]> From: "[InviterName]" <sip:[InviterName]@[Domain]>;tag=[localTag] Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [Adresse-TesterCSCF];branch=z9hG4bK[NewBranchId] Call-ID: [NewCallID] CSeq: [NewCseqNumber] SUBSCRIBE Max-Forwards: [MaxForwardsDefaultValue] Accept: application/conference-info+xml Event: conference Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, REFER, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, PUBLISH, PRACK Route: <sip:[Adresse-TestedCSCF];lr>,<sip:[Adresse-ServerCSCF];lr> Contact: "[InviterName]" <sip:[InviterName]@[Domain]> P-Preferred-Identity: "[InviterName]" <sip:[InviterName]@[Domain]> P-Access-Network-Info: 3GPP-UTRAN-TDD; utran-cell-id-3gpp=00000000 User-Agent: [UserAgent] Expires: 3600 Server: PoC-client/OMA1.0 Siemens/v2.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed;boundary="----=_Part_0" Content-Length: 0
